name: Has your practice completed a security risk assessment (SRA) before?
description: Has your practice completed a security risk assessment (SRA) before?

name: Do you review and update your SRA?
description: Do you review and update your SRA?

name: How often do you review and update your SRA?
description: How often do you review and update your SRA?

name: Do you include all information systems containing, processing, and/or transmitting ePHI in your SRA?
description: Do you include all information systems containing, processing, and/or transmitting ePHI in your SRA?

name: How do you ensure you are meeting current HIPAA security regulations?
description: How do you ensure you are meeting current HIPAA security regulations?

name: What do you include in your SRA documentation?
description: What do you include in your SRA documentation?

name: Do you respond to the threats and vulnerabilities identified in your SRA?
description: Do you respond to the threats and vulnerabilities identified in your SRA?

name: Do you identify specific personnel to respond to and mitigate the threats and vulnerabilities found in your SRA?
description: Do you identify specific personnel to respond to and mitigate the threats and vulnerabilities found in your SRA?

name: Do you communicate SRA results to personnel involved in responding to threats or vulnerabilities?
description: Do you communicate SRA results to personnel involved in responding to threats or vulnerabilities?

name: How do you communicate SRA results to personnel involved in responding to identified threats or vulnerabilities?
description: How do you communicate SRA results to personnel involved in responding to identified threats or vulnerabilities?

name: Do you maintain documentation of policies and procedures regarding risk assessment, risk management and information security activities?
description: Do you maintain documentation of policies and procedures regarding risk assessment, risk management and information security activities?

name: Do you review and update your security documentation, including policies and procedures?
description: Do you review and update your security documentation, including policies and procedures?

name: How do you update your security program documentation, including policies and procedures?
description: How do you update your security program documentation, including policies and procedures?

name: Is the security officer involved in all security policy and procedure updates?
description: Is the security officer involved in all security policy and procedure updates?

name: How does documentation for your risk management and security procedures compare to your actual business practices?
description: How does documentation for your risk management and security procedures compare to your actual business practices?

name: How long are information security management and risk management documents kept?
description: How long are information security management and risk management documents kept?

name: Do you make sure that information security and risk management documentation is available to those who need it?
description: Do you make sure that information security and risk management documentation is available to those who need it?

name: How do you ensure that security and risk management documentation is available to those who need it?
description: How do you ensure that security and risk management documentation is available to those who need it?

name: Who within your practice is responsible for developing and implementing information security policies and procedures?
description: Who within your practice is responsible for developing and implementing information security policies and procedures?

name: Do you identify and document the role and responsibilities of the security officer?
description: Do you identify and document the role and responsibilities of the security officer?

name: Is your security officer qualified for the position?
description: Is your security officer qualified for the position?

name: Do workforce members know who the security officer is?
description: Do workforce members know who the security officer is?

name: Do workforce members know how and when to contact the security officer?
description: Do workforce members know how and when to contact the security officer?

name: Who do people contact for security considerations if there is NO security officer?
description: Who do people contact for security considerations if there is NO security officer?

name: How are roles and job duties defined as pertained to accessing ePHI?
description: How are roles and job duties defined as pertained to accessing ePHI?

name: Do you screen your workforce members to verify trustworthiness?
description: Do you screen your workforce members to verify trustworthiness?

name: How are your workforce members screened to verify trustworthiness?
description: How are your workforce members screened to verify trustworthiness?

name: Do you ensure that all workforce members (including management) are given security training?
description: Do you ensure that all workforce members (including management) are given security training?

name: How do you ensure that all workforce members are given security training?
description: How do you ensure that all workforce members are given security training?

name: How long are records of workforce member security training kept?
description: How long are records of workforce member security training kept?

name: Are procedures in place for monitoring log-in attempts and reporting discrepancies?
description: Are procedures in place for monitoring log-in attempts and reporting discrepancies?

name: Is protection from malicious software (including timely antivirus/security updates and malware protection) covered in your procedures?
description: Is protection from malicious software (including timely antivirus/security updates and malware protection) covered in your procedures?

name: What password security elements are covered in your security training?
description: What password security elements are covered in your security training?

name: Do you ensure workforce members maintain ongoing awareness of security requirements?
description: Do you ensure workforce members maintain ongoing awareness of security requirements?

name: How does your practice ensure workforce members maintain ongoing awareness of security requirements?
description: How does your practice ensure workforce members maintain ongoing awareness of security requirements?

name: Do you have a sanction policy to enforce security procedures?
description: Do you have a sanction policy to enforce security procedures?

name: What is included in your sanction policy to hold personnel accountable if they do not follow your security policies and procedures?
description: What is included in your sanction policy to hold personnel accountable if they do not follow your security policies and procedures?

name: Do you manage and control personnel access to ePHI, systems, and facilities?
description: Do you manage and control personnel access to ePHI, systems, and facilities?

name: How do you manage and control personnel access to ePHI, systems, and facilities?
description: How do you manage and control personnel access to ePHI, systems, and facilities?

name: What is your process for authorizing, establishing, and modifying access to ePHI?
description: What is your process for authorizing, establishing, and modifying access to ePHI?

name: How much access to ePHI is granted to users or other entities?
description: How much access to ePHI is granted to users or other entities?

name: How are individual users identified when accessing ePHI ?
description: How are individual users identified when accessing ePHI ?

name: Do you ensure all of your workforce members have appropriate access to ePHI?
description: Do you ensure all of your workforce members have appropriate access to ePHI?

name: How do you make sure that your workforce's designated access to ePHI is logical, consistent, and appropriate ?
description: How do you make sure that your workforce's designated access to ePHI is logical, consistent, and appropriate ?

name: Do you use encryption to control access to ePHI?
description: Do you use encryption to control access to ePHI?

name: What procedures do you have in place to encrypt ePHI when deemed reasonable and appropriate?
description: What procedures do you have in place to encrypt ePHI when deemed reasonable and appropriate?

name: Do you use alternative safeguards in place of encryption?
description: Do you use alternative safeguards in place of encryption?

name: When encryption is deemed unreasonable or inappropriate to implement, do you document the use of an alternative safeguard?
description: When encryption is deemed unreasonable or inappropriate to implement, do you document the use of an alternative safeguard?

name: Have you evaluated implementing any of the following encryption solutions in your local environment?  (Full disk encryption, file/folder encryption, encryption of thumb drives or other external media)
description: Have you evaluated implementing any of the following encryption solutions in your local environment?  (Full disk encryption, file/folder encryption, encryption of thumb drives or other external media)

name: Have you evaluated implementing encryption solutions for any of the following cloud services? (Email service, file storage, web applications, remote system backups)
description: Have you evaluated implementing encryption solutions for any of the following cloud services? (Email service, file storage, web applications, remote system backups)

name: Have you evaluated implementing any of the following encryption solutions for data in transit? (Encryption of internet traffic by means of a VPN, web traffic over HTTP encrypted email, or secure file transfer)
description: Have you evaluated implementing any of the following encryption solutions for data in transit? (Encryption of internet traffic by means of a VPN, web traffic over HTTP encrypted email, or secure file transfer)

name: Do you periodically review your information systems for how security settings can be implemented to safeguard ePHI?
description: Do you periodically review your information systems for how security settings can be implemented to safeguard ePHI?

name: How are you aware of the security settings for information systems which process, store, or transmit ePHI?
description: How are you aware of the security settings for information systems which process, store, or transmit ePHI?

name: Do you use security settings and mechanisms to record and examine system activity?
description: Do you use security settings and mechanisms to record and examine system activity?

name: What mechanisms are in place to monitor or log system activity?
description: What mechanisms are in place to monitor or log system activity?

name: How do you monitor or track ePHI system activity?
description: How do you monitor or track ePHI system activity?

name: Do you have automatic logoff enabled on devices and platforms accessing ePHI?
description: Do you have automatic logoff enabled on devices and platforms accessing ePHI?

name: Do you ensure users accessing ePHI are who they claim to be?
description: Do you ensure users accessing ePHI are who they claim to be?

name: How do you ensure users accessing ePHI are who they claim to be?
description: How do you ensure users accessing ePHI are who they claim to be?

name: How do you determine the means by which ePHI is accessed?
description: How do you determine the means by which ePHI is accessed?

name: Do you protect ePHI from unauthorized modification or destruction?
description: Do you protect ePHI from unauthorized modification or destruction?

name: How do you confirm that ePHI has not been modified or destroyed without authorization?
description: How do you confirm that ePHI has not been modified or destroyed without authorization?

name: Do you protect against unauthorized access to or modification of ePHI when it is being transmitted electronically?
description: Do you protect against unauthorized access to or modification of ePHI when it is being transmitted electronically?

name: Have you implemented mechanisms to record activity on information systems which create or use ePHI ?
description: Have you implemented mechanisms to record activity on information systems which create or use ePHI ?

name: Do you manage access to and use of your facility or facilities [i.e. that house information systems and ePHI]?
description: Do you manage access to and use of your facility or facilities [i.e. that house information systems and ePHI]?

name: What physical protections do you have in place to manage facility security risks?
description: What physical protections do you have in place to manage facility security risks?

name: Do you restrict physical access to and use of your equipment [i.e. equipment that house ePHI]?
description: Do you restrict physical access to and use of your equipment [i.e. equipment that house ePHI]?

name: Do you manage workforce member, visitor, and third party access to electronic devices?
description: Do you manage workforce member, visitor, and third party access to electronic devices?

name: Do you have physical protections in place, such as cable locks for portable laptops, screen filters for screen visible in high traffic areas, to manage electronic device security risks?
description: Do you have physical protections in place, such as cable locks for portable laptops, screen filters for screen visible in high traffic areas, to manage electronic device security risks?

name: What physical protections do you have in place for electronic devices with access to ePHI?
description: What physical protections do you have in place for electronic devices with access to ePHI?

name: Do you keep an inventory and a location record of all of its electronic devices?
description: Do you keep an inventory and a location record of all of its electronic devices?

name: Do you have an authorized user who approves access levels within information systems and locations that use ePHI?
description: Do you have an authorized user who approves access levels within information systems and locations that use ePHI?

name: Do you validate a person's access to facilities (including workforce members and visitors) based on their role or function?
description: Do you validate a person's access to facilities (including workforce members and visitors) based on their role or function?

name: How do you validate a person's access to your facility?
description: How do you validate a person's access to your facility?

name: Do you have access validation requirements for personnel and visitors seeking access to your critical systems (such as IT, software developers, or network admins)?
description: Do you have access validation requirements for personnel and visitors seeking access to your critical systems (such as IT, software developers, or network admins)?

name: Does this include controlling access to your software programs for testing and revisions?
description: Does this include controlling access to your software programs for testing and revisions?

name: Do you have procedures for validating a third party persons access to the facility based on their role or function?
description: Do you have procedures for validating a third party persons access to the facility based on their role or function?

name: Do you have hardware, software, or other mechanisms that record and examine activity on information systems with access to ePHI?
description: Do you have hardware, software, or other mechanisms that record and examine activity on information systems with access to ePHI?

name: What requirements are in place for retention of audit reports?
description: What requirements are in place for retention of audit reports?

name: Do you maintain records of physical changes upgrades, and modifications to your facility?
description: Do you maintain records of physical changes upgrades, and modifications to your facility?

name: How do you maintain awareness of the movement of electronic devices and media?
description: How do you maintain awareness of the movement of electronic devices and media?

name: Are electronic devices secured?
description: Are electronic devices secured?

name: Do you back up ePHI to ensure availability when devices are moved?
description: Do you back up ePHI to ensure availability when devices are moved?

name: Do you ensure devices which created, maintained, received, or transmitted ePHI are effectively sanitized when they are disposed of?
description: Do you ensure devices which created, maintained, received, or transmitted ePHI are effectively sanitized when they are disposed of?

name: How do you determine what is considered appropriate use of electronic devices and connected network devices?
description: How do you determine what is considered appropriate use of electronic devices and connected network devices?

name: Do you ensure access to ePHI is terminated when employment or other arrangements with the workforce member ends?
description: Do you ensure access to ePHI is terminated when employment or other arrangements with the workforce member ends?

name: Do you have procedures for terminating or changing third-party access when the contract, business associate agreement, or other arrangement with the third party ends or is changed?
description: Do you have procedures for terminating or changing third-party access when the contract, business associate agreement, or other arrangement with the third party ends or is changed?

name: How do you ensure media is sanitized prior to re-use?
description: How do you ensure media is sanitized prior to re-use?

name: Do you contract with business associates or other third-party vendors?
description: Do you contract with business associates or other third-party vendors?

name: Do you allow third-party vendors to access your information systems and/or ePHI?
description: Do you allow third-party vendors to access your information systems and/or ePHI?

name: How do you identify which business associates need access to create, receive, maintain, or transmit ePHI?
description: How do you identify which business associates need access to create, receive, maintain, or transmit ePHI?

name: How does your practice enforce or monitor access for each of these business associates?
description: How does your practice enforce or monitor access for each of these business associates?

name: How do business associates communicate important changes in security practices, personnel, etc. to you?
description: How do business associates communicate important changes in security practices, personnel, etc. to you?

name: Have you executed business associate agreements with all business associates who create, receive, maintain, or transmit ePHI on your behalf?
description: Have you executed business associate agreements with all business associates who create, receive, maintain, or transmit ePHI on your behalf?

name: How do you maintain awareness of business associate security practices? (e.g. in addition to Business Associate Agreements)
description: How do you maintain awareness of business associate security practices? (e.g. in addition to Business Associate Agreements)

name: Do you include satisfactory assurances within your Business Associate Agreements pertaining to how your business associates safeguard ePHI?
description: Do you include satisfactory assurances within your Business Associate Agreements pertaining to how your business associates safeguard ePHI?

name: What terms are in your BAA's to outline how your business associates ensure  subcontractors access ePHI securely?
description: What terms are in your BAA's to outline how your business associates ensure  subcontractors access ePHI securely?

name: Do your BAA's require your third-party vendors to report security incidents to your practice in a timely manner?
description: Do your BAA's require your third-party vendors to report security incidents to your practice in a timely manner?

name: Have you updated all your BAA's to reflect the requirements in the 2013 Omnibus Rule updates to HIPAA?
description: Have you updated all your BAA's to reflect the requirements in the 2013 Omnibus Rule updates to HIPAA?

name: How does your practice document all of its business associates requiring access to ePHI?
description: How does your practice document all of its business associates requiring access to ePHI?

name: Do you obtain Business Associate Agreements (BAAs) from business associates who access another covered entity's ePHI on your behalf?
description: Do you obtain Business Associate Agreements (BAAs) from business associates who access another covered entity's ePHI on your behalf?

name: Does your practice have a contingency plan in the event of an emergency?
description: Does your practice have a contingency plan in the event of an emergency?

name: Is your contingency plan documented?
description: Is your contingency plan documented?

name: Do you periodically update your contingency plan?
description: Do you periodically update your contingency plan?

name: How do you ensure that your contingency plan is effective and updated appropriately?
description: How do you ensure that your contingency plan is effective and updated appropriately?

name: Have you considered what kind of emergencies could damage critical information systems or prevent access to ePHI within your practice?
description: Have you considered what kind of emergencies could damage critical information systems or prevent access to ePHI within your practice?

name: What types of emergencies have you considered?
description: What types of emergencies have you considered?

name: Have you documented in your policies and procedures various emergency types and how you would respond to them?
description: Have you documented in your policies and procedures various emergency types and how you would respond to them?

name: Does your practice have policies and procedures in place to prevent, detect, and respond to security incidents?
description: Does your practice have policies and procedures in place to prevent, detect, and respond to security incidents?

name: How does your practice prevent, detect, and respond to security incidents?
description: How does your practice prevent, detect, and respond to security incidents?

name: Has your practice identified specific personnel as your incident response team?
description: Has your practice identified specific personnel as your incident response team?

name: How are members of your incident response team identified and trained?
description: How are members of your incident response team identified and trained?

name: Has your practice evaluated and determined which systems and ePHI are necessary for maintaining business-as-usual in the event of an emergency?
description: Has your practice evaluated and determined which systems and ePHI are necessary for maintaining business-as-usual in the event of an emergency?

name: How would your practice maintain access to ePHI in the event of an emergency, system failure, or physical disaster?
description: How would your practice maintain access to ePHI in the event of an emergency, system failure, or physical disaster?

name: How would your practice maintain security of ePHI and crucial business processes before, during, and after an emergency?
description: How would your practice maintain security of ePHI and crucial business processes before, during, and after an emergency?

name: Do you have a plan for backing up and restoring critical data?
description: Do you have a plan for backing up and restoring critical data?

name: How is your practice's emergency procedure activated?
description: How is your practice's emergency procedure activated?

name: How is access to your facility coordinated in the event of disasters or emergency situations?
description: How is access to your facility coordinated in the event of disasters or emergency situations?

name: How is your emergency procedure terminated after the emergency circumstance is over?
description: How is your emergency procedure terminated after the emergency circumstance is over?

name: Do you formally evaluate the effectiveness of your security safeguards, including physical safeguards?
description: Do you formally evaluate the effectiveness of your security safeguards, including physical safeguards?
